website_summaries.verdict: Sibling computer to the m15, but with a 17-inch screen. Good for mobile users who want a bigger screen.
pros: Up to 32GB of RAM, ample storage, powerful processor, multiple colors, plenty of ports and a gorgeous screen
This is a machine that offers the best of both worlds when it comes to portability and power
cons: Can get close to overheating, making a cooling pad a must-have accessory

customer_reviews.title: All you need and more for 60fps 60hz gaming
customer_reviews.text: This computer (m17 2070rtx) will play any game full specs at 60fps and the monitor is 60 hz so that makes sense. I hook it up to my big screen tv. I also own the model before this as well - m15 with the 1070gtx and this one with the 2070 is a lot lighter (and longer obviously) Alienware is a great brand. If the graphics cards get outdated then you can buy the graphics amplifier and plug it into the back of these and it will run whatever new card you put into it using your laptops cpu/etc. I got this on sale around new years so I had to get it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: High quality Laptop
customer_reviews.text: While I have not really put this computer to the test, it appears to be very high quality and handles every simple PC game that I've thrown at it. Most of my games do not take a lot of processing power and this laptop is likely much more than I'll ever need, I wanted excess power in reserve and this appears to be a strong resource. The video card is the same one that my grandson has in his high priced VR set up that he custom built so I feel good about that.
customer_reviews.author: RCsRibboy

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying the features
customer_reviews.text: I have always liked Dell since Michael started in 1984 when I was 25. I am a 60 old gamer and an IT professional. I only wish this thing did not get so hot, but all high-performance laptops do. So fare very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: TechnoSleuth

customer_reviews.title: Worse for gamers! Good for 1 year kid—60hz screen
customer_reviews.text: Worse! 60 HZ !!! 2070 max-Q? Kidding me - worst for a gamer If u r not a “@@GAMER@@“., stay light years away! Worst laptop 💻, lost 113 games straight
customer_reviews.author: AmazedCust

customer_reviews.title: Freezes  unresponsive
customer_reviews.text: For gaming it was great but watching videos online it would randomly freeze and become unresponsive only a hard shut down would fix it. Until it did it again and again and again but works flawlessly for gaming
customer_reviews.author: Eric Hickman

customer_reviews.title: Needs additional hard drives. No support from Dell
customer_reviews.text: Lapt tip is great, but the Windows 10 was fake, has turned purchase new license, no space in the laptop had to purchase ssd cards. Dell support the s useless when I asked for 2,5”sata cady dimensions or cable to connect that hard drive. Found the cable after 3rd attempt but still can’t find cady that would fit to hold the hard drive in place.
customer_reviews.author: Ivars Asnis

customer_reviews.title: Windows NOT activated???
customer_reviews.text: Windows isn't activated?? It wants me to activate it??? Can someone help please?
customer_reviews.author: Luke Paul

customer_reviews.title: Prefect for me.
customer_reviews.text: I gave it 4 stars for the battery because it really doesn't last long. However considering its performance that's hardly a bad thing. Amazing computer. I don't play a lot of really intensive games, but this handled everything I threw at it.
customer_reviews.author: J. Sharp

customer_reviews.title: Quality and performance!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted graphics and speed at an affordable price. I got everything I wanted, along with the Alienware badge of quality and performance. Definitely one of the best laptops on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love my laptop
customer_reviews.text: I love this computer! It's exactly as advertised and runs perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Oliver Sonny Mendoza

customer_reviews.title: I am not even sure whether I purchased a grill or a laptop.
customer_reviews.text: Seriously, this laptop turns extremely hot every time I play a game, even playing league of legends. I have no idea why it takes so many energy to run a 10 years old game!
customer_reviews.author: Yumi

customer_reviews.title: Tons of power!
customer_reviews.text: Great laptop, but the power of the video card drains the battery very quickly which is to be expected.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Walker

customer_reviews.title: My grandson is very happy so I am also
customer_reviews.text: My grandson uses it for gaming and he loved it
customer_reviews.author: Betty l terrey

customer_reviews.title: Bad service for the fix my computer
customer_reviews.text: Too bad for this computer, I called service nobody can help!bad service
customer_reviews.author: tao liu

customer_reviews.title: Great deal! Best Buy 2399 saved 950.00 on amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for gaming and it boots quickly and runs smoothly
customer_reviews.author: greg piedt

customer_reviews.title: I advise it
customer_reviews.text: A light machine for its size 17 and excellent value after experience .
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed alazmi

customer_reviews.title: Great graphics for games. Powerful enough for engineering software
customer_reviews.text: This is a large laptop, but you probably already know that. This laptop holds it's own with many desktops. I tested it with Overwatch and ARK. Both games rendered beautifully. Movements were smooth and crisp. I also loaded several engineering programs; Solidworks 3D, NX12, and Matlab. I was able to complete tasks without any issues. Jobs I expect to be handled by a laptop performed very well. I am extremely pleased with the laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Water Monkey

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for gamers
customer_reviews.text: This notebook is the perfect gift for a gamer of any age. The quality of the graphics is outstanding. The notebook is very light-weight for everything it delivers. The look is sleek and impressive. I'm very happy about the battery life that allows for hours of use on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Clarissa's Blog

customer_reviews.title: Terrible customer S
customer_reviews.text: I bought on of these for my wife to take a drafting class with. I guess we must have got a lemon. After 40 days of gas been sent bach twice and they sent a tech up to try and resolve the issues. Their customer is terrible.Will never buy a Cell product again.
customer_reviews.author: T. Wright
